column1: Before you freak out about the Coronavirus, remember to freak out about the flu!! The world is dangerous scary and full of things to buy, more at 10.
Money is filthy. Someone with corona virus touches a bill, you get one, now your whole wallet is infected! Give it to me.

hi, friends i know have been fired from local restaurants and indie bookstores in the wake of coronavirus. "so they can go on unemployment" instead of patronizing small businesses, consider reorganizing society so workers are protected.
